about.title: About Me
abstract: I used to be UX/UI designer and model in HTML/CSS, but since discovered the magic of code for interfaces ... I fell in love !
I think one of the skills that makes me different, in addition to my wide CSS knowledge, i'ts knowing a lot of about user interfaces, design patterns and development interactions.
